question: Which among the following statement is correct ?
option1: Right to property is a fundamental right and right to privacy is a implied right
option2: Right to property is a legal right and right to privacy is a fundamental right
option3: Right to property is a implied right while right to privacy is a legal right
option4: Right to property is a Legal right while right to privacy is a implied right
answer: Right to property is a Legal right while right to privacy is a implied right
explanation: Right to property is a Legal right while right to privacy is a implied right. Right to property was made a legal right under Article 300-A in Part XII of the Constitution.
